name: burning spirit: halloween carnival '22 (sega genesis/mega drive)
name_original: burning spirit: halloween carnival '22 (sega genesis/mega drive)
description:
suika goes trick-or-treating in the scarlet mansion in a 2-minute score attack caravan stg that tries to pay homage to our favorite pc engine games.

a: shoot / start: pause

made in under 72 hours over 48 beers for touhou game jam 9 oct 20-23 2002. everything by me

postjam todo immediately: release source code, ui cleanup, balancing/slowdown love, fix reset bug. postjam todo soon enough: 5 minute mode, preserve high score

use the included blastem packages or ntsc hardware or upload to emulatrix or whatever. all credit for blastem to mike pavone check him out: retrodev.com/repos/blastem. sgdk by stef, check him out: github.com/Stephane-D

all characters, settings, original music property of ZUN/team shanghai alice

thanx to touhou game dev discord server <3
